entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Dome Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
